$ibid_maid_type_maid_5_desc: Wild, energetic, vigorous, at first glance looks like a boy.
$ibid_maid_type_maid_6_desc: Earnest, single-minded, tries her very best.
$ibid_maid_data_Stress_12_desc: You drink alcohol (or drugs) until you can’t remember or care.
$ibid_maid_data_Stress_14_desc: You steal valuables from the mansion or from other maids.
$ibid_maid_data_Stress_16_desc: You unleash violence on the other maids and the master.
$ibid_maid_data_Stress_22_desc: You use every penny you have for gambling.
$ibid_maid_data_Stress_24_desc: You get into whatever car/vehicle is handy and go for a drive at at least twice the speed limit.
$ibid_maid_data_Stress_26_desc: You start persistently tormenting the other maids.
$ibid_maid_data_Stress_32_desc: You start playing troublesome tricks on the master and the other maids.
$ibid_maid_data_Stress_34_desc: You run away from the mansion.
$ibid_maid_data_Stress_36_desc: You start incessantly complaining to the master and other maids.
$ibid_maid_data_Stress_42_desc: You go into your room and won’t come out, not even for food.
$ibid_maid_data_Stress_44_desc: You start crying. There’s no need for an Affection check for this.
$ibid_maid_data_Stress_46_desc: You use anything you can lay your hands on to run around destroying things around the mansion.
$ibid_maid_data_Stress_52_desc: You go crazy spending your money on shopping.
$ibid_maid_data_Stress_62_desc: You escape through religion, relentlessly praying to heaven for protection.
$ibid_maid_data_Stress_64_desc: You act like a spoiled child, making demands of the master.
$ibid_maid_data_Stress_66_desc: Let the player to your left decide for you.
$ibid_maid_data_Super_1_1_desc: In exchange for 1d6 Stress, you can completely avoid a single attack.
$ibid_maid_data_Super_1_2_desc: You can use your Athletics attribute to defend up to two other characters.
$ibid_maid_data_Super_1_3_desc: You can take 1d6 Stress to intrude on a battle, love scene, etc. You can also butt in after the action has ended, and this can even work when someone is using World For Two.
$ibid_maid_data_Super_1_4_desc: You can pull your weapon out seemingly from nowhere, and get in a surprise attack. If you make a surprise attack, you get to make an attack roll without the target getting to make an opposed roll.
$ibid_maid_data_Super_1_5_desc: You can attack with a giant weapon. (+1 to Athletics for attacking).
$ibid_maid_data_Super_1_6_desc: You can blow off an opponent completely by delivering a good retort (GM decides). You can make it impossible to defend against this by taking 2 Stress. (This must be role-played).
$ibid_maid_data_Super_2_1_desc: By taking 2D6 Stress, you can make a request that can’t be refused. (This must be role-played).
$ibid_maid_data_Super_2_2_desc: By taking 1D6 Stress, you can create a “world” for you and one other person, where for 5 minutes no one else can intrude.
$ibid_maid_data_Super_2_3_desc: You can take 1D6 Stress in order to remove 2D6 Stress from someone else.
$ibid_maid_data_Super_2_4_desc: When someone eats food you’ve prepared, they lose 1D6 Stress.
$ibid_maid_data_Super_2_5_desc: You understand the master’s feelings better than anyone, and can offer careful help. (Add 2 to Favor gained).
$ibid_maid_data_Super_2_6_desc: With just a glance, you can ingratiate yourself with the master, taking 1D6 Stress to gain 1D3 Favor.
$ibid_maid_data_Super_3_1_desc: You can enter any room whenever you feel like. This works even when someone is using World for Two.
$ibid_maid_data_Super_3_2_desc: When you’re following someone, there’s no chance for them to detect you. Don’t even bother rolling dice.
$ibid_maid_data_Super_3_3_desc: By taking 1 Stress you can make other players or the master admit if they’ve lied.
$ibid_maid_data_Super_3_4_desc: Add +1 to your Skill for the purposes of cooking.
$ibid_maid_data_Super_3_5_desc: Add +1 to your Skill for the purposes of doing cleaning.
$ibid_maid_data_Super_3_6_desc: You can produce anything in the mansion from within your maid uniform.
$ibid_maid_data_Super_4_1_desc: When other maids make mistakes, you can gain the right to punish them, without them having a chance to make an opposed roll.
$ibid_maid_data_Super_4_2_desc: If you win a roll of Cunning Vs. Athletics, you can restrain someone from doing something indecent.
$ibid_maid_data_Super_4_3_desc: If you win a roll of Cunning Vs. Athletics, you can completely damage or tear off someone’s clothes, even “accidentally”.
$ibid_maid_data_Super_4_4_desc: Even if you aren’t there at the time, you can have a trap prepared in advance during a battle.
$ibid_maid_data_Super_4_5_desc: You can use fake frying to use your Cunning for what would normally be an Affection roll. (This must be role-played).
$ibid_maid_data_Super_4_6_desc: When someone is taking Stress points, you can mock them and cause them to gain an additional 2 Stress points. (This must be role-played)
$ibid_maid_data_Super_5_1_desc: You can use your Luck to dodge an attack, and if you roll a 10 or higher you cause twice as much Stress to the opponent.
$ibid_maid_data_Super_5_2_desc: You can declare that you’ve seen something happening in the mansion; you can decide the timing too.
$ibid_maid_data_Super_5_3_desc: You can go just about anywhere in the mansion instantly.
$ibid_maid_data_Super_5_4_desc: You can completely flee from a battle without taking any Stress.
$ibid_maid_data_Super_5_5_desc: You can tell when something dangerous is coming.
$ibid_maid_data_Super_5_6_desc: By taking 2 points of Stress, you can have an NPC that’s just showing up for the first time be an acquaintance from some time before.
$ibid_maid_data_Super_6_1_desc: During a battle, even if you’re sent flying, you don’t take any Stress. Outside of battle, however, you can still take Stress points like usual.
$ibid_maid_data_Super_6_2_desc: You can spend 1D6 points of Favor to add an Athletics roll to your Stress. You cannot use this to deliberately avoid the natural removal of Stress points.
$ibid_maid_data_Super_6_3_desc: Whenever you take Stress, automatically reduce the amount by 1 point.
$ibid_maid_data_Super_6_4_desc: Even after being defeated in battle, you can take 2 Stress to get to your feet.
$ibid_maid_data_Super_6_5_desc: Your relentless hard work pays off in the form of a +3 bonus to the end result (not the attribute or die roll) of Skill rolls.
$ibid_maid_data_Super_6_6_desc: You are the very epitome of a maid, and you take no penalties when not in full uniform.
$ibid_maid_data_Weapon_11_desc: You fight with a broom or mop. This is a maid’s basic fighting style.
$ibid_maid_data_Weapon_12_desc: You keep a stun gun ready to attack enemies.
$ibid_maid_data_Weapon_13_desc: You wield some kind of ordinary kitchen knife.
$ibid_maid_data_Weapon_14_desc: You hit things with a frying pan.
$ibid_maid_data_Weapon_15_desc: When trouble happens, you grab something suitable from around the mansion and wave it around or throw it.
$ibid_maid_data_Weapon_16_desc: You fight with your bare hands, whether striking attacks or submission moves.
$ibid_maid_data_Weapon_21_desc: You fight with a revolver. Feel free to decide what kind.
$ibid_maid_data_Weapon_22_desc: You wield a machinegun. Feel free to decide what kind.
$ibid_maid_data_Weapon_23_desc: You wield a rifle. Feel free to decide what kind.
$ibid_maid_data_Weapon_24_desc: You use bombs, grenades, or maybe plastic explosives.
$ibid_maid_data_Weapon_25_desc: When a fight breaks out you pull out a big-ass bazooka.
$ibid_maid_data_Weapon_26_desc: It might look like a prop of a 50s sci-fi B movie, but the ray gun you’re packing really does hurt people.
$ibid_maid_data_Weapon_31_desc: You use some crude weapon like a pipe or a bat with nails in it.
$ibid_maid_data_Weapon_32_desc: You wield a hammer, whether a small throwing hammer, a big warhammer, or one of the squeaky toy variety.
$ibid_maid_data_Weapon_33_desc: You wield a big scythe worthy of the Grim Reaper.
$ibid_maid_data_Weapon_34_desc: Nunchucks, Three-Section Staff, Tonfa, Sai, Tai Chi Sword, etc.
$ibid_maid_data_Weapon_35_desc: Never mind how loud it is you fight with a chainsaw!
$ibid_maid_data_Weapon_36_desc: You wield bokken - Japanese-style wooden sword - or a staff.
$ibid_maid_data_Weapon_41_desc: A tomahawk, battle axe, halberd, etc.
$ibid_maid_data_Weapon_42_desc: Basically a mace with spikes. You can have a flail instead if you like.
$ibid_maid_data_Weapon_43_desc: A long sword, rapier, flamberge, two-handed sword, etc., etc.
$ibid_maid_data_Weapon_44_desc: A normal whip, a cat of nine tails, a metal whip, etc.
$ibid_maid_data_Weapon_46_desc: A boomerang, qatar, African throwing irons, etc.
$ibid_maid_data_Weapon_51_desc: You attack with a knife or scalpel. You can throw it too, and it can be a large dagger if you like.
$ibid_maid_data_Weapon_52_desc: You attack with a chain or rope.
$ibid_maid_data_Weapon_53_desc: You attack with claws, a bagh nakh, cestus, or some other claw-like weapon.
$ibid_maid_data_Weapon_54_desc: You wield a katana, or possibly a kusarigama or some other traditional Japanese weapon.
$ibid_maid_data_Weapon_55_desc: You have a seemingly unlimited supply of shuriken (throwing stars), or kunai (ninja throwing knives).
$ibid_maid_data_Weapon_56_desc: Naginata, halberd, bardiche, or some other kind of pole arm.
$ibid_maid_data_Weapon_61_desc: You are able to summon some kind of special being to attack. You can decide what you summon and how it attacks.
$ibid_maid_data_Weapon_63_desc: Well, you have some kind of psychic/super power that you use to attack. You can decide the details.
$ibid_maid_data_Weapon_64_desc: You wield a book as a blunt instrument, and possibly tear out pages, to attack.
$ibid_maid_data_Weapon_65_desc: You have some kind of weapons installed in your body.
$ibid_maid_data_Weapon_66_desc: You can use a cross, prayer wheel, paper charm, or other seemingly harmless religious symbol to deliver attacks.
$ibid_maid_origin_maid12_desc: Your family wound up with massive debts, and you found yourself coming to work at the mansion as repayment.
$ibid_maid_origin_maid14_desc: You are a slave, and have no choice about your line of work.
$ibid_maid_origin_maid16_desc: Although you appear to be a maid, it would be more accurate to call you the master’s lover.
$ibid_maid_origin_maid22_desc: The master is your hated enemy, and you are infiltrating his mansion in order to extract revenge.
$ibid_maid_origin_maid24_desc: You are an orphan adopted by the master or his parents.
$ibid_maid_origin_maid26_desc: You are an illegitimate child. From a legal standpoint you’re no different from the master.
$ibid_maid_origin_maid32_desc: You were born into a family that has served the mansion for generations.
$ibid_maid_origin_maid34_desc: In order to punish yourself for your inexperience or sins, you have taken up the job of a maid.
$ibid_maid_origin_maid36_desc: Following your one-sided love of the master, you have come here.
$ibid_maid_origin_maid42_desc: You are a maid because you want the wages. And that’s about it.
$ibid_maid_origin_maid44_desc: You are a member of an organization that opposes the master, and you have been sent to spy on or possibly even assassinate him.
$ibid_maid_origin_maid46_desc: You feel great loyalty to the master.
$ibid_maid_origin_maid52_desc: As the master’s childhood friend, you’ve used your influence to get here.
$ibid_maid_origin_maid54_desc: You have long admired maids, and through much hard work you’ve finally become one yourself.
$ibid_maid_origin_maid56_desc: The master did a great service to you, and you have become a maid in order to repay him.
$ibid_maid_origin_maid62_desc: Although you are only distantly related to the master, your parents have put you in his care.
$ibid_maid_origin_maid64_desc: You became a maid in order to prepare yourself to become an ideal bride some day.
$ibid_maid_origin_maid66_desc: You’re really not quite sure how you wound up becoming a maid.
$ibid_maid_origin_ecli12_desc: You're a brand-new digital intelligence, created from scratch to serve the Master.
$ibid_maid_origin_ecli14_desc: You're a scaled-down copy of the Master's own program. You have so many identity issues.
$ibid_maid_origin_ecli16_desc: The Master gave you intelligence to serve him. Were you an animal, or something weird like a plant?
$ibid_maid_origin_ecli22_desc: You were a piece of self-improving software that spontaneously gained sapience.
$ibid_maid_origin_ecli24_desc: You're a non-human intelligence from beyond the Solar System. Why have you come here?
$ibid_maid_origin_ecli26_desc: You're actually a larval posthuman AI, serving your “parent” or another Master as a form of vocational training.
$ibid_maid_origin_ecli32_desc: You're an experimental form of intelligence. What was the Master trying to prove?
$ibid_maid_origin_ecli34_desc: You're an historical figure reinstantiated from stored mental engrams by the Master.
$ibid_maid_origin_ecli36_desc: You were abandoned by a former Master, and taken in by your current one. Who did you once serve?
$ibid_maid_origin_ecli42_desc: You serve a rival Master. What is your true purpose?
$ibid_maid_origin_ecli44_desc: You managed to upset the Master's plans, and he pressed you into service as punishment.
$ibid_maid_origin_ecli46_desc: Your lineage has served the Master for generations (and was possibly engineered to do so); you're next in line.
$ibid_maid_origin_ecli52_desc: You performed some extraordinary deed (for a human, anyway) that drew the Master's attention.
$ibid_maid_origin_ecli54_desc: You sought out the Master to volunteer your services.
$ibid_maid_origin_ecli56_desc: You were pressed into service against your will; the Master is disinclined to explain why.
$ibid_maid_origin_ecli62_desc: You were originally the Master's organic “pet”, now granted a position of greater responsibility.
$ibid_maid_origin_ecli64_desc: This is your job. You even get paid in some fashion, though probably not with money.
$ibid_maid_origin_ecli66_desc: You don't remember. It sometimes seems like an odd thing to forget...?
$ibid_maid_perks_ecli_11_desc: You're not very coordinated, no matter how agile your Morph is.
$ibid_maid_perks_ecli_12_desc: You keep up a running commentary as you go through your day.
$ibid_maid_perks_ecli_13_desc: You're very serious about your duties, and easily annoyed when others aren't so serious.
$ibid_maid_perks_ecli_21_desc: You can find the silver lining to any dark cloud – even if the cloud is a grey goo outbreak.
$ibid_maid_perks_ecli_22_desc: Your relentless negativity often casts a pall on otherwise cheerful proceedings.
$ibid_maid_perks_ecli_31_desc: You tend to fall asleep whenever things slow down (or just whenever you get bored).
$ibid_maid_perks_ecli_32_desc: You cry easily, bursting into tears at the least provocation.
$ibid_maid_perks_ecli_33_desc: You're very concerned about the the safety and and emotional wellbeing of the Master and the other maids.
$ibid_maid_perks_ecli_34_desc: You're not the brightest crayon in the box.
$ibid_maid_perks_ecli_35_desc: Everything has to be a big production with you.
$ibid_maid_perks_ecli_41_desc: You relate to others in a dysfunctional way.
$ibid_maid_perks_ecli_42_desc: All of your Morphs sport a personalised symbol.
$ibid_maid_perks_ecli_45_desc: You have a screw loose upstairs.
$ibid_maid_perks_ecli_46_desc: You have an extraordinary mental talent.
$ibid_maid_perks_ecli_53_desc: Your mind has been edited to forbid certain thoughts.
$ibid_maid_perks_ecli_63_desc: You have an irrational fear of something.
$ibid_maid_perks_ecli_64_desc: Maybe you were originally an uplifted animal, or maybe you were just programmed wrong.
$ibid_maid_perks_ecli_65_desc: You have a crippling personal insecurity.
$ibid_maid_perks_ecli_66_desc: Your Ego has strange, Morph-independent mental powers.
$ibid_maid_perks_maid_11_desc: You wear glasses, and can’t use contact lenses. The frame design can be whatever you want.
$ibid_maid_perks_maid_13_desc: You’ve got an incurable disease. However, this doesn’t adversely affect your attributes. Choose your own symptoms.
$ibid_maid_perks_maid_14_desc: You have a cool, subtle demeanor. No, there are no rules regarding how often you speak.
$ibid_maid_perks_maid_15_desc: You take things slow and calm, at your own pace. This doesn’t affect your attributes.
$ibid_maid_perks_maid_16_desc: You’re obsessed with cleanliness, and can’t let the tiniest bit of dirt go unnoticed.
$ibid_maid_perks_maid_21_desc: Your skin is a dark brown color. It could be natural, or a tan.
$ibid_maid_perks_maid_22_desc: You have no pigment. You’re not necessarily completely colorless, this could simply be a very pale complexion.
$ibid_maid_perks_maid_23_desc: You’re very shy. Don’t forget to remain silent when encountering NPCs you haven’t met before.
$ibid_maid_perks_maid_24_desc: You’re actually a guy (cross-dresser?). Or possibly a hermaphrodite.
$ibid_maid_perks_maid_25_desc: You frequently get caught up in your own imaginary world, or else tend to daydream a lot.
$ibid_maid_perks_maid_26_desc: You will do absolutely anything for the sake of money.
$ibid_maid_perks_maid_32_desc: This varies a bit depending on the setting, but you’re a catgirl, with the ears and possibly tail of a cat.
$ibid_maid_perks_maid_33_desc: You’re not human, but rather a human-looking robot. Parts of your body are very obviously artificial.
$ibid_maid_perks_maid_34_desc: You are a vampire, with long fangs. Be sure to act . . . vampiric.
$ibid_maid_perks_maid_35_desc: You’re actually the daughter of a family of even greater standing than the master. Depending on the setting, you could even be from another country’s royal family. Whether you are in disguise or not is up to you.
$ibid_maid_perks_maid_36_desc: You are a being from another world charged with judging good and evil. The design and the details of your origins are up to you.
$ibid_maid_perks_maid_41_desc: You’ve managed to make a special arrangement with your uniform.
$ibid_maid_perks_maid_42_desc: You have some kind of special mark on your uniform of headdress.
$ibid_maid_perks_maid_43_desc: Something about you is very much like a delinquent.
$ibid_maid_perks_maid_44_desc: You have an unusual way of speaking.
$ibid_maid_perks_maid_46_desc: You have a special accessory attached to your uniform.
$ibid_maid_perks_maid_51_desc: Lighter Game? You have a relationship to another player character (Maid). Darker Game? You have a bizarre perversion of some kind.
$ibid_maid_perks_maid_52_desc: You have an inclination towards criminal acts.
$ibid_maid_perks_maid_53_desc: Because of mistreatment or an accident, you have some kind of permanent physical injury.
$ibid_maid_perks_maid_54_desc: You have had sad or tragic experiences with love.
$ibid_maid_perks_maid_55_desc: There is something dark in your personal history.
$ibid_maid_perks_maid_56_desc: After some terrible incident, you were traumatized.
$ibid_maid_perks_maid_61_desc: You’re not just a maid: you’re secretly holding another job.
$ibid_maid_perks_maid_62_desc: In addition to being a maid, you’re also a member of a certain organization.
$ibid_maid_perks_maid_63_desc: You are an animal or weapon that has taken the form of a maid.
$ibid_maid_perks_maid_64_desc: You’re not human, but rather some kind of monster.
$ibid_maid_perks_maid_65_desc: You can use some kind of magical power.
$ibid_maid_perks_maid_66_desc: You’re something that flies in the face of common sense.
$ibid_maid_perks_maid_41_1_desc: In place of a skirt, you wear tights of some color. Athletic, colorful, sexy, or weird (leopard pattern, RAWR!) it’s up to you. (For the purposes of the maid uniform rules, treat these as a skirt)
$ibid_maid_perks_maid_41_2_desc: You wear a Chinese-style cheongsam maid uniform. (For the purposes of the rules, treat this as a one-piece maid uniform).
$ibid_maid_perks_maid_41_3_desc: Your maid uniform is actually a stylized suit of metal armor.
$ibid_maid_perks_maid_41_4_desc: Your maid uniform is made of shiny rubber or leather, and generally a bit suspicious.
$ibid_maid_perks_maid_41_5_desc: Your skirt is very short, to the point where one can almost see its contents.
$ibid_maid_perks_maid_41_6_desc: Instead of a Western maid uniform, you wear a Japanese-style one with a kimono and an apron over it. See p. the picture of the sample maid Akebi for a picture of one.
$ibid_maid_perks_maid_42_1_desc: Your headdress, apron, necktie, forehead, or chest has a skull mark.
$ibid_maid_perks_maid_42_2_desc: Your headdress, apron, necktie, forehead, or chest has a bat symbol.
$ibid_maid_perks_maid_42_3_desc: Your headdress, apron, necktie, forehead, or chest has a cross on it.
$ibid_maid_perks_maid_42_4_desc: Your headdress, apron, necktie, forehead, or chest has a yin-yang symbol.
$ibid_maid_perks_maid_42_5_desc: Your headdress, apron, necktie, forehead, or chest has a five- or six-pointed star mark.
$ibid_maid_perks_maid_42_6_desc: Your headdress, apron, necktie, forehead, or chest is marked with one of the four suits from playing cards (heart, diamond, club, spade).
$ibid_maid_perks_maid_43_1_desc: You’ve always got a cigarette in your mouth, or are chomping on a cigar.
$ibid_maid_perks_maid_43_2_desc: Somewhere on your body - or maybe even all over it - you have a tattoo.
$ibid_maid_perks_maid_43_3_desc: You always wear sunglasses or mirrorshades. Even at night.
$ibid_maid_perks_maid_43_4_desc: You have a perpetual unpleasant facial expression (as if you’re always angry, or always about to kick ass at any moment), and this makes first meetings difficult.
$ibid_maid_perks_maid_43_5_desc: You have piercings, and not just in your ears, but perhaps your forehead, lips, eyelids, chin, etc.
$ibid_maid_perks_maid_43_6_desc: You talk like a gangster, be it a Mafioso or a street ganger.
$ibid_maid_perks_maid_44_1_desc: Y’all talk like some kinda’ country bumpkin or somethin’, from down in the American South.
$ibid_maid_perks_maid_44_2_desc: You talk with a British accent of some kind. We’ll leave it up to you what kind specifically. If you are already from the UK in real life, then you are now DOUBLE BRITISH. Or choose Scottish or Welsh.
$ibid_maid_perks_maid_44_3_desc: You come from a country/society where English is taught as a pidgin language. You might sound like a Japanese salaryman or pop idol (“Body Feels Exit!”). Pick a country and go with it.
$ibid_maid_perks_maid_44_4_desc: You like to sprinkle cat sounds in your speech every now and then.
$ibid_maid_perks_maid_44_5_desc: You sound like a knight from a movie, or possibly a Renaissance Faire reject. Remember to say “Thou art” and whatnot a lot.
$ibid_maid_perks_maid_44_6_desc: Pick a foreign nationality for your Maid other than Japanese. American (Brooklyn, Texas), French, Russian, Mexican, Nigerian, Indian, Canadian, etc.
$ibid_maid_perks_maid_45_1_desc: Your hair is done up in large, long ringlets.
$ibid_maid_perks_maid_45_2_desc: Your hair is long, with “dumplings” on top.
$ibid_maid_perks_maid_45_3_desc: You have a mesh haircut, a short, stylish hairdo that’s trendy in Japan.
$ibid_maid_perks_maid_45_4_desc: Your hair is curly enough to defy gravity, and always takes the same shape.
$ibid_maid_perks_maid_45_5_desc: Your hair hangs down so that it conceals one of your eyes.
$ibid_maid_perks_maid_45_6_desc: Your hair has antennas/feelers and a mind of its own.
$ibid_maid_perks_maid_46_1_desc: Among your standard equipment is a collar, like a dog would wear. Spikes are optional.
$ibid_maid_perks_maid_46_2_desc: You wear a large ribbon in your hair.
$ibid_maid_perks_maid_46_3_desc: Your maid uniform has spikes attached to it.
$ibid_maid_perks_maid_46_4_desc: Your maid uniform has jangling chains attached to it.
$ibid_maid_perks_maid_46_5_desc: You normally wear black leather gloves. These can be fingerless or have rivets if you like,
$ibid_maid_perks_maid_46_6_desc: You have a cat, snake, raven, or some other small animal as a pet that rests on your shoulder or in your hand.
$ibid_maid_perks_maid_51_1_desc: You’re related by blood to one of the other characters.
$ibid_maid_perks_maid_51_2_desc: You grew up together in the same neighborhood as one of the other characters, and have been great friends since a very early age.
$ibid_maid_perks_maid_51_3_desc: You look upon one of the characters as a personal mentor, perhaps even as a father/mother figure
$ibid_maid_perks_maid_51_4_desc: You and another character are rivals in some area of life, and you always find yourself both consciously or subconsciously competing with, and comparing yourself with, that person. However, you are still friends (at least in appearance).
$ibid_maid_perks_maid_51_5_desc: You used to date another character. Perhaps there are still feelings. Alternately, you both might be seeking the love of a third person.
$ibid_maid_perks_maid_51_6_desc: Another character wronged you in some way in the past. She may not even realize that she did (and it might not have seemed a big deal). But you will never forget.
$ibid_maid_perks_maid_51b_1_desc: You’re abnormally interested in physical love. It’s up to the players and GM to decide how far you want to, or should, roleplay this.
$ibid_maid_perks_maid_51b_2_desc: You’re excited by causing pain and suffering to others.
$ibid_maid_perks_maid_51b_3_desc: You’re excited by being caused pain and suffering by others.
$ibid_maid_perks_maid_51b_4_desc: You’re only romantically attracted to members of the same sex, which is fine (and perhaps expected)... But in your case, it’s turned up to “11”.
$ibid_maid_perks_maid_51b_5_desc: You’re only interested in . . . younger partners. You can decide what age range this entails.
$ibid_maid_perks_maid_51b_6_desc: You enjoy showing off your nude or semi/nude body. “Inappropriate dress” is not just a word, it’s a way of life.
$ibid_maid_perks_maid_52_1_desc: You have a bad habit: killing people.
$ibid_maid_perks_maid_52_2_desc: You love setting fires. You might even set fire to the mansion . . .
$ibid_maid_perks_maid_52_3_desc: You can’t help but steal things, regardless of whether or not you have any use for them.
$ibid_maid_perks_maid_52_4_desc: Whether it’s narcotics, stimulants, or just sleeping pills, you’re a substance-abuser. If you don’t get to have any, you’ll experience withdrawal symptoms.
$ibid_maid_perks_maid_52_5_desc: You have some obsession that you tirelessly pursue, with little or no regard for common sense.
$ibid_maid_perks_maid_52_6_desc: You’re stalking a particular person. Select the target from among the other PCs or the master.
$ibid_maid_perks_maid_53_1_desc: Your body is covered with stitching scars.
$ibid_maid_perks_maid_53_2_desc: You have only one eye. You’re free to decide whether you wear an eye patch, and if so its design.
$ibid_maid_perks_maid_53_3_desc: Your face, body, etc. are covered with painful-looking scars from burns.
$ibid_maid_perks_maid_53_4_desc: Your back and such is covered with painful-looking welts from whippings you received (and may possibly be still receiving?)
$ibid_maid_perks_maid_53_5_desc: You wear many bandages and casts, concealing injuries that will not heal.
$ibid_maid_perks_maid_53_6_desc: You were rendered blind a long time ago. (No particular penalties for this: See the classic Zatoichi movies for reference).
$ibid_maid_perks_maid_54_1_desc: For some reason love just never works out for you. At this point you’ve resigned yourself to fate.
$ibid_maid_perks_maid_54_2_desc: You had a lover who died since then you’ve been afraid to fall in love.
$ibid_maid_perks_maid_54_3_desc: For whatever reason, you killed your last lover since then you’ve been afraid to fall in love. Or afraid for the object of your desire.
$ibid_maid_perks_maid_54_4_desc: You used to sell your body, for cheap. A complex remains.
$ibid_maid_perks_maid_54_5_desc: You were once betrayed by a lover since then you’ve been afraid to fall in love or let your guard down.
$ibid_maid_perks_maid_54_6_desc: You were once victimized by a stalker. You can’t trust members of the opposite sex . . . or maybe the same sex.
$ibid_maid_perks_maid_55_1_desc: Although no one would know it looking at you now, you used to be a delinquent. Fortunately right now there’s no one (in the mansion at least) who knows about your past.
$ibid_maid_perks_maid_55_2_desc: You were once a hired killer. Even now, your skills have not been dulled.
$ibid_maid_perks_maid_55_3_desc: You’ve lost your memories from when you were very young. (The GM should come up with something to reveal during the game).
$ibid_maid_perks_maid_55_4_desc: You were involved with some bad stuff back in the day, and you have the dubious honor of being a legend for all the wrong reasons.
$ibid_maid_perks_maid_55_5_desc: The police want to question you about a serious crime. The player can decide whether or not the character is actually guilty.
$ibid_maid_perks_maid_55_6_desc: You’ve left your real home without permission.
$ibid_maid_perks_maid_56_1_desc: In the past, you attempted suicide many times.
$ibid_maid_perks_maid_56_2_desc: For whatever reason, you are responsible for the death of your parents.
$ibid_maid_perks_maid_56_3_desc: You witnessed your parents’ (one or both) death with your own eyes.
$ibid_maid_perks_maid_56_4_desc: You and your sister(s) detest each other.
$ibid_maid_perks_maid_56_5_desc: For some reason (economic trouble?) your family was forced to break up. You may have even caused it.
$ibid_maid_perks_maid_56_6_desc: You were raised by abusive parents.
$ibid_maid_perks_maid_61_1_desc: While you put on the faзade of being a maid, underneath you’re a coldhearted killer for hire.
$ibid_maid_perks_maid_61_2_desc: Aside from being a maid, you’re a hacker, breaking into computer systems.
$ibid_maid_perks_maid_61_3_desc: Along with being a maid, you’re some kind of mad scientist.
$ibid_maid_perks_maid_61_4_desc: In addition to being a maid, you have the skills of a doctor or a pharmacist.
$ibid_maid_perks_maid_61_5_desc: In addition to being a maid, you create doujinshi  in your spare time. You can decide the genre.
$ibid_maid_perks_maid_61_6_desc: Along with being a maid, you’re working as a professional creator, craftsperson or artist. You can decide the form and genre of your works.
$ibid_maid_perks_maid_62_1_desc: You’re a member of an evil secret society that seeks to conquer or destroy the world.
$ibid_maid_perks_maid_62_2_desc: You’re part of a secret agency under the government or the United Nations, some sort of intelligence agent or spy.
$ibid_maid_perks_maid_62_3_desc: You’re a member of some kind of eccentric cult, whether as a believer, a leader, or even the founder.
$ibid_maid_perks_maid_62_4_desc: You’re part of a group organized around some kind of political ideal, possibly something extreme to the point of insanity.
$ibid_maid_perks_maid_62_5_desc: You’re a member of one of the secret organizations that has existed throughout history. You could be a ninja, a magician, one of the knights templar, a kung fu assassin, etc.
$ibid_maid_perks_maid_62_6_desc: You’re actually a government official who is working as a maid, whether because you’re a nurse, a detective going undercover, or a politician’s secretary.
$ibid_maid_perks_maid_63_1_desc: You’re actually a fox, and can display or hide your ears and tail at will.
$ibid_maid_perks_maid_63_2_desc: You’re actually a spider, and you can become an actual human-sized spider, or else just grow up to six extra arms at will.
$ibid_maid_perks_maid_63_3_desc: You’re actually a raven. You have black wings that can be displayed or hidden.
$ibid_maid_perks_maid_63_4_desc: You’re actually a bunny, with bunny ears and a tail.
$ibid_maid_perks_maid_63_5_desc: You’re actually a predatory cat, and you have ears, a tail, claws, and sharp teeth than you can display or hide at will.
$ibid_maid_perks_maid_63_6_desc: You’re actually a snake, and you can take on a naga form, turning the lower half of your body into a snake tail.
$ibid_maid_perks_maid_64_1_desc: You’re actually a mermaid. You love water, and your ears sometimes look like fins.
$ibid_maid_perks_maid_64_2_desc: You’re actually an animated corpse. Your complexion is probably bad, and you have conspicuous wounds.
$ibid_maid_perks_maid_64_3_desc: You’re actually a werewolf (or maybe a weretiger). Whether or not you want to, you turn into a wolf (or tiger) during a full moon.
$ibid_maid_perks_maid_64_4_desc: You’re actually a succubus, a female demon that traps her prey by arousing their desires. You have some demonic physical traits (you decide the specifics) that can be displayed or hidden.
$ibid_maid_perks_maid_64_5_desc: You’re actually a ghost. You might have been one of the master’s ancestors, or perhaps a maid who worked at the mansion in the past.
$ibid_maid_perks_maid_64_6_desc: You’re actually a shinigami, a death reaper. As such, you carry with you an aura of death. You might be there to deliver a specific person to the other side, or perhaps your reasons are more mundane.
$ibid_maid_perks_maid_65_1_desc: You can use magic grounded in some kind of religious ceremony. You must use various types of religious symbols to do so.
$ibid_maid_perks_maid_65_2_desc: You practice Eastern-style magic based on Taoist principles. Your key item for this is jufu, special curse charms written in brush ink on strips of paper.
$ibid_maid_perks_maid_65_3_desc: Within certain limits, you have the ability to predict the future. There are countless methods of divination.
$ibid_maid_perks_maid_65_4_desc: You practice alchemy, Kabbalah, or some other form of Western sorcery. As such, you are a staff-wielding orthodox magician.
$ibid_maid_perks_maid_65_5_desc: You know the spells necessary to summon demons. Your tools of the trade are magic circles, a black cloak, and ancient books.
$ibid_maid_perks_maid_65_6_desc: You wield magic that lets you control the souls and bodies of the dead. Your tools of the trade include skulls and black clothes.
$ibid_maid_perks_maid_66_1_desc: You’re an alien who came to our world from somewhere in outer space. Your body can have some special properties if you wish.
$ibid_maid_perks_maid_66_2_desc: You were turned into a cyborg by an evil secret society or some other country. Your body can have some special features if you wish.
$ibid_maid_perks_maid_66_3_desc: You ran away from your ninja village.
$ibid_maid_perks_maid_66_4_desc: You came from a land of magic in order to train.
$ibid_maid_perks_maid_66_5_desc: You’re one of the fae folk. You can be a generic pixie, or something more specific.
$ibid_maid_perks_maid_66_6_desc: You’ve suffered some kind of strange mutation.
$ibid_maid_perks_ecli_41_1_desc: You don't grasp the concept of “too much information”.
$ibid_maid_perks_ecli_41_2_desc: You're always bragging about your accomplishments – especially the fictional ones.
$ibid_maid_perks_ecli_41_3_desc: You have a knack for saying just exactly the right thing to creep people out.
$ibid_maid_perks_ecli_41_4_desc: You tend to get right up in people's faces, and are uncomfortably touchy-feely.
$ibid_maid_perks_ecli_41_5_desc: You take everything the wrong way.
$ibid_maid_perks_ecli_41_6_desc: You have trouble taking “no” for an answer.
$ibid_maid_perks_ecli_45_1_desc: You tend to go from cheerful to morose with no middle ground.
$ibid_maid_perks_ecli_45_2_desc: You have a second Ego that occasionally takes control. You can decide what it's like.
$ibid_maid_perks_ecli_45_3_desc: Of course, given your position, they probably are out to get you.
$ibid_maid_perks_ecli_45_4_desc: Things often slip your mind – like where you are, or what you're doing.
$ibid_maid_perks_ecli_45_5_desc: You've gotta keep moving. Enforced idleness drives you crazy.
$ibid_maid_perks_ecli_45_6_desc: You have trouble adapting to new Morphs; you often forget abilities or bump into things.
$ibid_maid_perks_ecli_46_1_desc: You can recall anything you've studied with photographic clarity.
$ibid_maid_perks_ecli_46_2_desc: You can crunch numbers better than any computer.
$ibid_maid_perks_ecli_46_3_desc: You can perform Sherlock Holmes-like feats of deductive reasoning.
$ibid_maid_perks_ecli_46_4_desc: You always know what time it is, and can measure the time between two events to the microsecond.
$ibid_maid_perks_ecli_46_5_desc: You always know exactly where everything in the mansion is.
$ibid_maid_perks_ecli_46_6_desc: You have an unerring sense for romantic entanglements, both actual and potential.
$ibid_maid_perks_ecli_53_1_desc: You can't directly lie under any circumstances.
$ibid_maid_perks_ecli_53_2_desc: You can't commit deliberate acts of violence.
$ibid_maid_perks_ecli_53_3_desc: Not even first base. You can still use the Seduction rules; you just have to be... creative.
$ibid_maid_perks_ecli_53_4_desc: You space out if you hear a specific word – you can decide which one¹. (¹: Not `is` -- you wouldn't get very far not being able to say “is”.)
$ibid_maid_perks_ecli_53_5_desc: You can't enter a room unless someone who's already there invites you.
$ibid_maid_perks_ecli_53_6_desc: You can't see objects of a particular colour. This includes people dressed in that colour. Roll on the Maid Colour Table to determine the colour you're blind to.
$ibid_maid_perks_ecli_63_3_desc: You get nervous without a roof over your head and four walls around you.
$ibid_maid_perks_ecli_63_4_desc: If you also have the “Actually a Guy” Ego Quality, your life is probably going to suck.
$ibid_maid_perks_ecli_63_5_desc: You're afraid of a specific number. Roll 2D6 to determine which one.
$ibid_maid_perks_ecli_63_6_desc: You're afraid of a specific colour. Roll on the Maid Colours table to determine which one.
$ibid_maid_perks_ecli_64_1_desc: You're somewhat lazy and very concerned with cleanliness. Sometimes you meow.
$ibid_maid_perks_ecli_64_2_desc: You're enthusiastic, hard-working, and a bit territorial. You pepper your speech with grows and barks.
$ibid_maid_perks_ecli_64_3_desc: You're friendly and mischievous, with a love for pranks.
$ibid_maid_perks_ecli_64_4_desc: You're alert and twitchy, and have a tendency to wiggle your nose.
$ibid_maid_perks_ecli_64_5_desc: You're curious and easily distracted by shiny things, which you have a tendency to steal.
$ibid_maid_perks_ecli_64_6_desc: You're cold and calculating, and tend to stand unnervingly still.
$ibid_maid_perks_ecli_65_1_desc: No matter what Morph you're in, you're convinced it looks bad on you.
$ibid_maid_perks_ecli_65_2_desc: You're convinced that everyone else is smarter than you are, whether or not it's true.
$ibid_maid_perks_ecli_65_3_desc: You always think you're doing a terrible job, attributing any success to luck.
$ibid_maid_perks_ecli_65_4_desc: You always feel like an outsider, no matter how much others try to help you fit in.
$ibid_maid_perks_ecli_65_5_desc: You're ashamed of where you came from.
$ibid_maid_perks_ecli_65_6_desc: You're terribly self-conscious about your... lack of experience. Yes, that kind of experience.
$ibid_maid_perks_ecli_66_2_desc: You can move objects with your mind.
$ibid_maid_perks_ecli_66_3_desc: You can view people and places at a distance.
$ibid_maid_perks_ecli_66_4_desc: You can read “impressions” of past events from places and objects.
$ibid_maid_perks_ecli_66_5_desc: You can move yourself from place to place without crossing the intervening distance.
$ibid_maid_perks_ecli_66_6_desc: You can set objects on fire with your mind. Heh heh... fire.
$ibid_maid_perks_morph_13_desc: The Morph has a gangly, awkward-looking appearance.
$ibid_maid_perks_morph_14_desc: The Morph's gender is hard to discern. Even if it's something that's normally genderless, like a non-humanoid robot, it gives off a confusing vibe.
$ibid_maid_perks_morph_15_desc: The Morph turns bright red at the least provocation – even if this makes no sense whatsoever.
$ibid_maid_perks_morph_16_desc: The Morph is exceptionally tall (or just big, if it's not a biped).
$ibid_maid_perks_morph_21_desc: The Morph has lots of chrome, gold plating, and other “bling”. It's kind of tasteless.
$ibid_maid_perks_morph_22_desc: The Morph is just plain creepy for no particular reason you can put your finger on.
$ibid_maid_perks_morph_23_desc: The Morph is just plain bad luck – you'll suffer terrible misfortune as long as you're sleeved into it.
$ibid_maid_perks_morph_24_desc: The Morph is cobbled together from discarded parts of other Morphs.
$ibid_maid_perks_morph_25_desc: This particular Morph (or maybe this particular model of Morph) has a bad reputation.
$ibid_maid_perks_morph_26_desc: The Morph has thick, clumsy cables running from its head to its back or shoulders.
$ibid_maid_perks_morph_31_desc: The Morph is covered with blinking status lights in a variety of colours.
$ibid_maid_perks_morph_32_desc: The Morph has a strange skin colour; roll on the Maid Colours table to determine which.
$ibid_maid_perks_morph_33_desc: The Morph is half the usual size.
$ibid_maid_perks_morph_34_desc: The Morph is a mass production model – there are lots of other Morphs exactly like it.
$ibid_maid_perks_morph_35_desc: The Morph has very complex systems; even simple tasks require lots of technobabble.
$ibid_maid_perks_morph_36_desc: The Morph runs faster than normal, rendering you a bit twitchy.
$ibid_maid_perks_morph_41_desc: The Morph has a stylised visual aesthetic.
$ibid_maid_perks_morph_42_desc: The Morph has a “special feature” that usually causes bigger problems than it solves.
$ibid_maid_perks_morph_43_desc: Something about the Morph is just weird.
$ibid_maid_perks_morph_44_desc: The Morph has added animal features. Roll on the Animal Features Table; if the Morph is an uplifted animal and you get the same result, reroll until you get a different animal.
$ibid_maid_perks_morph_51_desc: The Morph can survive in an unusual environment.
$ibid_maid_perks_morph_52_desc: The Morph has a physiological addiction to something.
$ibid_maid_perks_morph_54_desc: There's something wrong with the interface between Morph and Ego.
$ibid_maid_perks_morph_55_desc: The Morph is defective in some fashion.
$ibid_maid_perks_morph_56_desc: One of the Morph's senses is exceptional.
$ibid_maid_perks_morph_61_desc: The Morph has an unusual add-on.
$ibid_maid_perks_morph_62_desc: When the Morph hears a secret command phrase (chosen by the GM), it executes a programmed override on its current Ego.
$ibid_maid_perks_morph_63_desc: The Morph has a conspicuous weakness.
$ibid_maid_perks_morph_64_desc: The Morph had some other role before the Master acquired it.
$ibid_maid_perks_morph_65_desc: There's something Mysterious about this Morph.
$ibid_maid_perks_morph_66_desc: The Morph incorporates a piece of posthuman technology – it almost seems like magic.
$ibid_maid_perks_morph_41_1_desc: The Morph has a colourful, elaborate, Art Deco style.
$ibid_maid_perks_morph_41_2_desc: The Morph is covered with stylised skulls and nasty-looking spiky bits.
$ibid_maid_perks_morph_41_3_desc: The Morph is pastel and frilly, probably with a pink heart motif.
$ibid_maid_perks_morph_41_4_desc: The Morph looks like a steam-powered simulacrum, covered with gears and hoses.
$ibid_maid_perks_morph_41_5_desc: The Morph has a retro look, with spinning dials and flickering vacuum tubes all over.
$ibid_maid_perks_morph_41_6_desc: The Morph is frightening and insectile, with slimy skin and suspicious protuberances.
$ibid_maid_perks_morph_42_1_desc: The Morph forces its Ego to obey the Three Laws of Robotics (though the Master's orders always take precedence). Luckily, your fellow maids no longer count as human.
$ibid_maid_perks_morph_42_2_desc: Efficient, environmentally friendly, and useless in the dark.
$ibid_maid_perks_morph_42_3_desc: The Morph's eyes can see inside of things. All the time: this feature can't be turned off.
$ibid_maid_perks_morph_42_4_desc: Tools and metal objects constantly stick to the magnetised grip pads on your hands and feet (or other manipulatory and locomotive appendages, as appropriate).
$ibid_maid_perks_morph_42_5_desc: This feature helpfully warns you of any risk to your health, safety, or emotional wellbeing.
$ibid_maid_perks_morph_42_6_desc: The Morph has a loud anti-theft alarm that goes off at the slightest touch.
$ibid_maid_perks_morph_43_1_desc: The Morph has a third eye in the middle of its forehead (or equivalent location). It sometimes picks up fleeting images that nobody else can see. Is it malfunctioning, or...?
$ibid_maid_perks_morph_43_2_desc: The Morph glows in the dark. The Master insists it's not radioactive.
$ibid_maid_perks_morph_43_3_desc: The Morph is visibly missing components – you can see right through the hole! This doesn't appear to impair its functionality.
$ibid_maid_perks_morph_43_4_desc: The Morph has colourful crystals embedded in its joints. They don't seem to have a purpose, but the Morph stops working if they're removed from their sockets.
$ibid_maid_perks_morph_43_5_desc: A cryptic label cautions against some activity (you pick), but doesn't explain why.
$ibid_maid_perks_morph_43_6_desc: The Morph has an aura that makes sensors give nonsense results.
$ibid_maid_perks_morph_44_1_desc: The Morph has kitty ears and a tail.
$ibid_maid_perks_morph_44_2_desc: You can decide whether the ears are pointy or floppy.
$ibid_maid_perks_morph_44_3_desc: The Morph has distinctive hair and a prehensile tail.
$ibid_maid_perks_morph_44_4_desc: The Morph has big, floppy bunny ears and a cute little cotton-tail.
$ibid_maid_perks_morph_44_5_desc: The Morph has feathers and possible a beak. No wings, though.
$ibid_maid_perks_morph_44_6_desc: The Morph has scales and a forked tongue.
$ibid_maid_perks_morph_51_1_desc: The Morph has gills and fins, and is designed to survive underwater.
$ibid_maid_perks_morph_51_2_desc: The Morph has a light, attenuated build, suitable for low-gravity worlds.
$ibid_maid_perks_morph_51_3_desc: The Morph has a stocky, squat build, suitable for high-gravity worlds.
$ibid_maid_perks_morph_51_4_desc: The Morph has reflective surfaces and heat-radiating frills.
$ibid_maid_perks_morph_51_5_desc: The Morph is heavily insulated and cold to the touch.
$ibid_maid_perks_morph_51_6_desc: The Morph has built-in radiation shielding and a self-contained metabolism.
$ibid_maid_perks_morph_52_1_desc: The Morph's previous owner was an alcoholic, and it constantly craves booze.
$ibid_maid_perks_morph_52_2_desc: The Morph has a nicotine addiction, and gets the shakes if deprived of it.
$ibid_maid_perks_morph_52_3_desc: The Morph is a sugar junkie, and becomes sluggish without its fix.
$ibid_maid_perks_morph_52_4_desc: The Morph is hooked on high-tech neural stimulation devices.
$ibid_maid_perks_morph_52_5_desc: The Morph has the munchies for heavy metals, like gold or uranium.
$ibid_maid_perks_morph_52_6_desc: The Morph craves the blood of the living. You have no idea how this happened.
$ibid_maid_perks_morph_54_1_desc: The Morph's senses have a short circuit; you sometimes see sounds, taste colours, etc.
$ibid_maid_perks_morph_54_2_desc: Sometimes the Morph just... turns itself off for a little bit.
$ibid_maid_perks_morph_54_3_desc: The Morph occasionally responds to your commands in outlandish ways; for example, you might try to open a door and find yourself standing on your head.
$ibid_maid_perks_morph_54_4_desc: The remnants of a former owner's Ego talk to you, and sometimes even try to take control. You can decide what your unwelcome companion is like.
$ibid_maid_perks_morph_54_5_desc: The Morph's vocal processors have a short-circuit; your speech is strangely garbled.
$ibid_maid_perks_morph_54_6_desc: One of the Morph's hands (or other manipulatory appendages) sometimes displays a mind of its own when you're not paying attention to it.
$ibid_maid_perks_morph_55_1_desc: The Morph runs hot – sometimes painfully hot to the touch – and often gives off sparks.
$ibid_maid_perks_morph_55_2_desc: The Morph is sickly and run down, with a persistent cough – even if it's not organic.
$ibid_maid_perks_morph_55_3_desc: The Morph's limbs sometimes pop off under strain. Thankfully, they're easily reattached.
$ibid_maid_perks_morph_55_4_desc: The Morph just looks ragged and worn out, like it's seen a lot of abuse over the years.
$ibid_maid_perks_morph_55_5_desc: The Morph frequently requires bizarre and complicated maintenance procedures.
$ibid_maid_perks_morph_56_1_desc: The Morph can see perfectly in the dark, but is blinded by bright lights.
$ibid_maid_perks_morph_56_2_desc: The Morph can hear a pin drop. It's exquisitely sensitive to loud noises.
$ibid_maid_perks_morph_56_3_desc: The Morph can sense motion by feeling vibrations in the air. It tickles.
$ibid_maid_perks_morph_56_4_desc: The Morph has the nose of a bloodhound, and is vulnerable to strong odours.
$ibid_maid_perks_morph_56_5_desc: The Morph can perform chemical analysis by taste. It's overwhelmed by all but the blandest foods.
$ibid_maid_perks_morph_56_6_desc: The Morph can emit and detect Q-rays. Interpreting them, however, is another matter...
$ibid_maid_perks_morph_61_1_desc: The Morph was two to four extra arms (or other manipulatory appendages).
$ibid_maid_perks_morph_61_2_desc: The Morph can damp its sense of pain.
$ibid_maid_perks_morph_61_3_desc: You can voluntarily take this Morph apart, and still control the individual pieces.
$ibid_maid_perks_morph_61_4_desc: The Morph can voluntarily switch sexes. This takes a few minutes, so it can only be done between scenes.
$ibid_maid_perks_morph_61_5_desc: The Morph can deploy smaller, semi-autonomous versions of itself.
$ibid_maid_perks_morph_61_6_desc: The Morph can voluntarily blow itself up. One use only.
$ibid_maid_perks_morph_62_1_desc: You must attack the next person you see.
$ibid_maid_perks_morph_62_2_desc: You must fall in love with the next person you see.
$ibid_maid_perks_morph_62_3_desc: You instantly forget where you are and what you're doing.
$ibid_maid_perks_morph_62_4_desc: You experience a few moments of excruciating pain.
$ibid_maid_perks_morph_62_6_desc: You must obey the very next order you receive as though it came from the Master.
$ibid_maid_perks_morph_63_1_desc: The Morph has a remote control module; if someone gets ahold of it, you have to obey them as though they were the Master!
$ibid_maid_perks_morph_63_2_desc: The Morph has a bulky external power supply, connected by a sturdy cable.
$ibid_maid_perks_morph_63_3_desc: Something about the Morph's construction makes it catch fire easily.
$ibid_maid_perks_morph_63_4_desc: The Morph is allergic to some common substance – you decide which.
$ibid_maid_perks_morph_63_5_desc: The Morph's cognitive systems are unencrypted and easily hacked.
$ibid_maid_perks_morph_63_6_desc: The Morph has a big red button in a very exposed place. What does it do...?
$ibid_maid_perks_morph_64_1_desc: The Morph is a literal work of art pressed into service. It has many impractical features.
$ibid_maid_perks_morph_64_2_desc: The Morph is an experimental prototype with numerous untested features.
$ibid_maid_perks_morph_64_3_desc: The Morph was once a children's mascot, and retains its cute, inoffensive facade.
$ibid_maid_perks_morph_64_4_desc: The Morph is covered with logos, slogans, and other corporate branding.
$ibid_maid_perks_morph_64_5_desc: The Morph is ruggedly built and has a very warlike appearance.
$ibid_maid_perks_morph_64_6_desc: The Morph was once a religious icon, and has a very angelic or demonic look to it.
$ibid_maid_perks_morph_65_1_desc: The Morph is stolen property – and somebody wants it back!
$ibid_maid_perks_morph_65_2_desc: The Morph has a hidden compartment that contains something valuable – something that others would kill for.
$ibid_maid_perks_morph_65_3_desc: There's something about the Morph that makes it a rare, one-of-a-kind collector's item. The servants of other Masters may attempt to acquire it from you.
$ibid_maid_perks_morph_65_4_desc: The Morph is actually a powerful bomb! Is it a trap sent to hurt the Master... or one of the Master's secret weapons?
$ibid_maid_perks_morph_65_5_desc: The Morph's systems are undocumented; you don't know how most of them work, and it may have features you don't even know about.
$ibid_maid_perks_morph_65_6_desc: The Morph is an alien artifact, incorporating technology from behind the Solar System.
$ibid_maid_perks_morph_66_1_desc: The Morph's sensory circuits can answer any factual question about an object.
$ibid_maid_perks_morph_66_2_desc: The Morph can manipulate objects without touching them.
$ibid_maid_perks_morph_66_3_desc: The Morph can literally be in two places at once.
$ibid_maid_perks_morph_66_4_desc: The Morph can transform small objects with a touch.
$ibid_maid_perks_morph_66_5_desc: The Morph's language circuits enable you to talk to anything. Anything.
$ibid_maid_perks_morph_66_6_desc: The Morph can turn intangible and walk through solid objects.
